EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/Redmonk Open Source Playbook_Q116.Replay
EmailTemplate.subject: Why open source is critical to digital transformation webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=dsc-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Pivotal-Redmonk-OSS-webinar-Q116]]> VIEW WEBINAR NOW <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016]]> More enterprise executives are realizing that an active open source software strategy is critical to transforming their business in the software-driven economy. While developers may rejoice, other parts of the organization may struggle with what this means for their processes and role requirements.
Join RedMonk analyst, Stephen O’Grady, and Pivotal’s Director of Open Source, Roman Shaposhnik, to learn:
- Why open source is critical to digital transformation - What best practices to follow to avoid pitfalls - Where you should start to make changes and gain quick wins
By the end of this webinar you should have a high-level checklist for 2016 to make open source software support your digital transformation vision.
